channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Microsoft Entra HR and Inbound Provisioning – World’s Best Boss Edition
item.description:
Hello everyone, this is David Loder again, with another topic inspired by a recent customer interaction. They had a complex on-prem AD setup that was preventing them from showing their desired management org structure in the M365 Exchange Online Global Address List.
In this article we are going to look at the Entra ID HR/Inbound Provisioning flows, specifically at the boss manager attribute. Almost all customers with which I work are still running hybrid environments. Therefore, we’ll be looking at how HR/Inbound Provisioning gets the manager data to Active Directory correctly so ...
